mapper.select: select t1.`name` from tb_sys_user t1, tb_sys_user_role t2 where t1.id = t2.user_id and t1.`status` = '1' and t2.`status` = '1' and role_id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
SELECT t1.id,t1.`name` FROM tb_sys_user t1, tb_sys_user_role t2 where t1.id = t2.user_id and t1.`status` = '1' and t2.`status` = '1' and t2.role_id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT DISTINCT t.id,t.`name` from tb_sys_user t left join (SELECT t1.id,t1.`name` FROM tb_sys_user t1, tb_sys_user_role t2 where t1.id = t2.user_id and t1.`status` = '1' and t2.`status` = '1' and t2.role_id = #{roleId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) tt on t.id = tt.id where t.`status` = '1' and tt.id is null
and t.`name` like CONCAT('%', #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%')

select DISTINCT t.id, t.role_name as roleName, t.create_time as createTime, t.creator, t.`status` from tb_sys_role t left join (select t1.id,t1.role_name from tb_sys_role t1 , tb_sys_user_role t2 where t1.id = t2.role_id and t1.`status` = '1' and t2.`status` = '1' and t2.user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ) tt on t.id = tt.id where t.`status` = '1' and tt.id is null
and t.role_name like CONCAT('%', #{roleName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%')
